sentence.Network_en: Morel subdued, afraid to seem too jubilant in presence of his wife.
sentence.Network_cn: 毛莱尔默不作声, 唯恐在妻子面前过于喜形于色.

sentence.Network_en: Mrs Morel was full of information when she got home from Nottingham.
sentence.Network_cn: 莫雷尔太太从诺丁汉回家来的时候总是一肚子消息.

sentence.Network_en: Mrs Morel was bitter against her husband for his many misdeeds.
sentence.Network_cn: 毛莱尔夫人严厉指责她丈夫的许多不良行为.

...假羊肚菌（False morel）是对一些子囊菌门真菌的非正式称呼，这些真菌包括鹿花菌属（Gyromitra）、马鞍菌属（Helvella）与钟菌属等的部分物种，因为它们的外表与羊肚菌属|真羊肚菌（羊肚菌属）非常相似。这些真菌都隶属于盘菌目，包括了属于羊肚菌科、.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 17th cent.: from French morille, from Dutch morilje; related to German Morchel 'fungus'

means.word_mean: 1. any of various edible mushrooms of the genus Morchella having a brownish spongelike cap
